#include <iostream>
#define gc getchar_unlocked
#define pc putchar_unlocked

typedef long long ll;
using namespace std;

int main() {
    ll t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        string s;
        cin>>s;
        ll sum = 0;
        for(ll i=0; i<s.length(); i++)
        {
            if(s[i]>='0'&&s[i]<='9')
                sum+=(s[i]-'0');
        }
        cout<<sum<<endl;
    }
	return 0;
}
